name: L U N E
description: LUNE is a experiential haiku, a short poem dedicated to the exploration of the new medium of VR. You can touch and play; poke and prod; dance, move, caress, or simply meditate as you build yourself a pillow fort made from stars, in the company of the quiet moon.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 100 MB available space
